full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title: 
Application/Software Architect, Level 3 (one resource)

## Reference Number: 
PW-23-01022075

## Solicitation Number: 
182485-TBIPS-RFP-CIHR

## Publication Date: 
January 19, 2023

## Tender Closing Date: 
February 3, 2023, at 02:00 PM (EST)

## Tender Description: 
The Canadian Institutes of Health Research requires the professional services of one Application/Software Architect (Level 3) to provide Microsoft Project Online implementation services and related activities for the project titled "Project Management Solution."

## Selection Criteria: 
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the technical and financial proposals submitted in response to this request for proposal (RFP).

## Tender Information:
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Canadian Institutes of Health Research
- **Contact Information**:
  - Name: Stephanie Lamoureux
  - Email: stephanie.lamoureux@cihr-irsc.gc.ca
  - Phone: 343-552-2845

## Trade Agreements: 
The tender is open to bidders from Canada and signatory countries of the following trade agreements:
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada- UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Regional Opportunities: 
- National Capital Region (NCR)
- Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

This rewritten entry is in a more professional tone with correct grammar, and formatting. It only includes relevant information from the original document. The essential details about the tender announcement are preserved. I've formatted the output in markdown format as requested, with clear headings and concise descriptions.

I also reformatted the trade agreements section to reflect that the bid is open to bidders from Canada and signatory countries, making it clear that this is not an exhaustive list of available agreements.

If you have any further requests or need adjustments, please let me know.  Please let me know if i was able to accomplish the task. 

Thank you for the opportunity!  Good day!
